meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ultimate.
meanings.sent1: The ultimacies of his decisions always impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: She reached the ultimacies of her career after years of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The ultimacies of the situation made everyone laugh at the irony.
meanings.sent4: The ultimacies of nature's beauty were revealed in the colorful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the ultimacies of the lesson with clarity and enthusiasm.

meanings.sent1: The team celebrated reaching the ultimacies of their victory.
meanings.sent2: After much research, he finally understood the ultimacies of the theory.
meanings.sent3: The ultimacies of the game left everyone in awe of the unexpected outcome.
meanings.sent4: The ultimacies of her efforts were evident in the successful project completion.
meanings.sent5: The journey led them to the ultimacies of their adventure, a breathtaking view from the mountaintop.
